description: React component 'BarChart' that renders a responsive bar chart with customizable data, colors, and title. Handles loading states and empty data gracefully.

methods.name: BarChart({ data, color = "#0D9488", xKey = "label", yKey = "value", title = "Breakdown", loading = false })
